text: "Movin' Out (Anthony's Song)" is a 1977 song by Billy Joel and taken from his fifth studio album The Stranger. It went to number 11 in Canada, number 17 in the United States, number 31 in New Zealand and number 35 in the United Kingdom and was turned into a musical in 2002. ==Track listing== ;Europe # "Movin' Out (Anthony's Song)" – time: 3:28 # "She's Always a Woman" – time: 3:21 ;UK # "Movin' Out (Anthony's Song)" – time: 3:28 # "Vienna" – time: 3:34 ;United States # "Movin' Out (Anthony's Song)" – time: 3:28 # "Everybody Has A Dream" – time: 4:36 Category:1977 songs Category:Billy Joel songs
title: Movin' Out (Anthony's Song)
